quest.name: Orange Crush
journal: Bhirdraeg seeks to restore equilibrium by having the local fauna culled.
Puks prey on the insects that pollinate La Noscean oranges, upsetting the balance of nature on Summerford Farms. Assist Bhirdraeg by culling five puk hatchlings.
You have carried out the culling as bade. Return to Bhirdraeg and inform him that the puks stop here.
With the bees back about their business, the La Noscean oranges will grow. Nevertheless, all will be for naught if the lazing pirates let the fruit rot on the boughs.

dialogue.name: BHIRDRAEG
dialogue.text: La Noscean orange nectar is sweet, but rest assured it's paid for in sweat.

dialogue.name: BHIRDRAEG
dialogue.text: We have to pollinate each orange by hand because of the blasted puks that prey on the nearby bees.

dialogue.name: BHIRDRAEG
dialogue.text: If we could only eradicate some five puk hatchlings, it would save us from having to do nature's work.

dialogue.name: BHIRDRAEG
dialogue.text: The buzz on the wind tells me you've done the deed.

dialogue.name: BHIRDRAEG
dialogue.text: The only pests plaguin' my orchard are those woeful whelps-out-of-water.

dialogue.name: BHIRDRAEG
dialogue.text: If only you could rid me of the parasitic pirates as you did the pesky puks!
